prompt: A circle smoothly transforming into a square
generated_code:
from manim import *

class CircleToSquare(Scene):
    def construct(self):
        # Create a circle
        circle = Circle(radius=2, color=BLUE)
        circle.set_fill(BLUE, opacity=0.5)
        
        # Create a square
        square = Square(side_length=4, color=GREEN)
        square.set_fill(GREEN, opacity=0.5)
        
        # Position the square to overlap with the circle
        square.move_to(circle.get_center())
        
        # Display the circle
        self.play(Create(circle), run_time=2)
        self.wait(1)
        
        # Transform the circle into the square
        self.play(Transform(circle, square), run_time=6)
        
        # Hold the final square on screen
        self.wait(1)
